channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement 100% obstructed, 19th January
item.description:
ROAD CLOSED sign blocks pavement outside 6 Deep Street. No provision for footway closure or redirection. Does not comply with DoT guidance which requires at least 1m of pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Deep Street, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fix, 19th January
item.description:
Whole road is a Danger and disgrace from Crickley hill park to salterley grange. You have to swerve to avoid various holes. One which is bad is marked. Please resurface this road. It’s too fast, narrow and dangerous. The temporary fixes are too temporary!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Salterley Grange Salterley Grange, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter strewn down both sides of B4070, 19th January
item.description:
There is a build up of unsightly litter down both sides of the B4070 as it approaches Birdlip from the A417. This has been exacerbated by recent mowing of the verges and drivers using this road as a short cut throwing litter from cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4070, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another trolley, 19th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Acre Nursery Tewkesbury Road, Uckington

item.title: Misleading traffic lights - dangerous!, 18th January
item.description:
Now new mini roundabouts in place I have noticed temp traffic lights all set to green. I think this is misleading and dangerous. Motorists see green and may presume that they will be driving unopposed when some may have noticed the roundabouts and will be attempting to turn. This is confusing and there have already been near misses. The solution is to properly disable the traffic lights is so they are out of play (not all set to green) and that it is clear the mini roundabouts have precedence. When the junctions need to be controlled the lights can be brought back in. Please resolve urgently before there is an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Pear Tree Cottage Old Gloucester Road, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive Pothole, 18th January
item.description:
Massive pothole that literally takes up the entire side of the road over the bus stop along Gloucester Rd. Causes a lot of traffic in rush hour as everyone slows down to go over it slowly as it is so large. Will damage a car if left needs sorting asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Campden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unsafe Pavement, 18th January
item.description:
The wall has been removed alongside this narrow bit of pavement, leaving a significant drop. Additionally the remaining pavement is now so narrow that prams and similar struggle to pass.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Broadway Road, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another Flytip and Smouldering Fire at Location - repeated, 18th January
item.description:
The location is the entrance and behind the wall on the footpath, to the Old Quarry off the Cleeve Common Road. A small flytip here was reported a few days ago and has now been added to together with a fire. The tip consists of car parts, christmas decorations and NAILS on the car parking bit. Please can this be cleared up as soon as possible especially the nails and especially behind the entrance wall where the fire is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet
